about_the_game:
Trapped in your routine, the days become increasingly strange as your mind begins to fail.

Fractured Perception is an atmospheric first-person horror game where you'll live your routine while experiencing weird events.

It's a short story where you'll feel your mental state being torn apart as you learn more about this mystery.

You'll solve puzzles to unravel this story.

Gameplay

  • Puzzles

  • Walking simulator

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains scenes of blood, gore, and depictions of death and suicide.
